text: but that would mean moving away from their @ispdotcom email address... just getting them to move off Win7 was a battle in itself! it was only when the hard drive in Dad's laptop died that he was finally resigned to getting a new laptop which meant a new OS. I hate PST files too but looks like i'm stuck with it. For the time being i've moved from POP3 to IMAP and set to keep the mail on the server (they don't get much mail really) so will see how that goes over the next 6 months and hopefully that gets them out of trouble. The root cause of this was effectively outlook being configured with the mailbox PST in the my documents folder then the onedrive trying to sync the pst and setting all the onedrive locations to cloud only. Maybe they ticked a box or unticked a box during the setup...

metadata.topic: RE: Microsoft stop messing with my people's task bar settings.
